#summary changes in latest version
version 0.9.5-trunk:
  * printer speed improved
  * added record-print-nesting-limit
  * rational number arithmetic speed improved
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=25&can=1 Issue 25]: added new OpenGL example
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=26&can=1 Issue 26]: added `process` and `process-wait` for linux/darwin

version 0.9.5-update1:
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=7&can=1 Issue 7]: added library-extensions
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=8&can=1 Issue 8]: added uninstall target to Makefile
  * Top-level program syntax will be checked if it have `#!r6rs` before import form
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=11&can=1 Issue 11]: record printer use write instead of display

  * See [KnownBugs Known bugs in current release] to check more.
